name: dcc-the-portal-under-the-stars
title: DCC Level 0 Adventure - The Portal Under the Stars
description: Every 50 years, the Empty Star rises in the night sky. You and your peasant friends aren't going to miss this chance to see what secrets it reveals in the old stone mounds.
author: DCC Foundry Volunteer Team (https://discord.gg/2PR9YH9)
